content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    result.filename(),
    count(1)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://nyctaxistorageadls2.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) AS [result]
